Name: Tax exemption and abatement for certain rehabilitated buildings as authorized by section 488-a of the real property tax law.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to tax exemption and abatement for certain rehabilitated buildings as authorized by section 488-a of the real property tax law
Summary: This local law would extend the 488-A program through December 31, 2019.
Text:
Int. No. 1119

By Council Members Williams, Dickens, Gentile, Vallone, Kallos and Levin (by request of the Mayor)

..Title
A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to tax exemption and abatement for certain rehabilitated buildings as authorized by section 488-a of the real property tax law
..Body

Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

            
            Section 1.  Paragraph (i) of subdivision b of section 11-244 of the administrative code of the city of New York, as amended by local law number 56 for the year 2007, is amended to read as follows:
            (i)  the eligible improvements are commenced after July first, nineteen hundred eighty, and prior to December thirty-first, two thousand [eleven] nineteen, and are completed within thirty-six months from commencement;
            ï¿½ 2.  This local law takes effect immediately.
